text: Edwards in 2012 Pip Edwards (born 1980) is an Australian fashion designer. She is co-founder of sportswear label P.E Nation. Edwards has been called "one of the most influential figures in the Australian fashion industry." Edwards has worked as a fashion designer at sass & bide, Ksubi and General Pants Co. She became contributing fashion editor at Cleo in 2009. In 2016, Edwards founded P.E Nation along with Claire Tregoning. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Australian fashion designers Category:1980 births
title: Pip Edwards
